questionsData.title: Wasp is a kind of insect.
Wood can be found in three states.
questionsData.explain_answer: wood is primarily found in its solid state naturally but wood can be chemically processed into a liquid state (e.g., for the production of paper), and it can be converted into a gaseous state through combustion.

questionsData.title: We can use lenses to make things look bigger.
Hertz is a unit of measurement.
Vaccines are given to prevent infection from the same disease.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Vaccines work by exposing your body to a weakened or inactive form of a virus or bacteria. This triggers your immune system to develop antibodies that can fight off the real disease if you encounter it later. 

diseases are spread by germs.and vaccination using a very weak form of the disease could lead to immunity.

questionsData.title: Orbit is the path of a planet or moon.
The police officer is the one who refuses to help people.
questionsData.explain_answer: The police officer is the person who helps people .

questionsData.title: On the beach, there is no sand.
Breakfast is the first meal you have in the morning.
People who make crimes should remain unpunished.
questionsData.explain_answer: "People who make crimes should not remain unpunished."

questionsData.title: Black stork is a kind of rare bird.
"I didn't want to wake up" is said when you had a pleasant dream.
Petrol shortage is to have plenty of petrol.
questionsData.explain_answer: Petrol shortage means to have a scarcity of petrol."

questionsData.title: Advantage is the opposite of useful.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Advantage is the opposite of defect or .Disadvantage

useless or harmful the opposite of usefulis

questionsData.title: Adult people are grown up people.
Unnecessary information are used when filling an application form.
questionsData.explain_answer: necessary information are used when filling an application form.

questionsData.title: Creating and making new things are synonyms.
Blanching is a kind of process used when working in companies.
questionsData.explain_answer: The term "blanching" typically refers to a cooking technique where food, often vegetables, is briefly immersed in boiling water and then transferred to cold water to halt the cooking process.

questionsData.title: Nets are used to get rid of fish.
questionsData.explain_answer: Nets are commonly used in fishing to catch fish, not to get rid of them.

questionsData.title: Mystery is something possible to explain.
questionsData.explain_answer: A mystery refers to something that is unknown or difficult to understand.

questionsData.title: The text is mainly talking about ……
questionsData.article: The homeless are among the extremely poor. They are, by definition, people who sleep in streets, parks, shelters and places that were never intended for living in, such as bus stations, streets, or empty buildings. According to Peter Rossi’s study of the Chicago homeless, most are African American men in their mid-30s with an educational level (similar 2) to that of the general population. Most have never married, if they have, their marriages have failed. Most held their last steady job more than four years earlier, and the rest have worked only occasionally at jobs involving low skills and low (salaries 1). Other studies have shown that many of the homeless are families with children, alcohol and drug abusers, and people (who 3) are mentally ill.

questionsData.title: There isn’t …… water in the tanker.
One of the following is a compound word
questionsData.explain_answer:
A compound word is a word that is formed by combining two or more separate words together to create a new word with its own meaning..

Some examples of compound words include:

  1. Football (foot + ball)
  2. Blackboard (black + board)
  3. Sunflower (sun + flower)
  4. Raincoat (rain + coat)
  5. Firefly (fire + fly)

questionsData.title: They had a big fight with their neighbours. The word " fight" is a/an……
questionsData.explain_answer: "fight" is used as a noun. It refers to conflict between individuals or groups.

questionsData.title: The suffix …… changes the word "short" into a verb.
questionsData.explain_answer: The suffix that changes the word "short" into a verb is "-en". When added to the adjective "short", it transforms it into the verb "shorten", which means to make something shorter in length, duration, or size.

questionsData.title: The weather in March is getting …….
Sana'a is as ….as Cairo
He is willing ….. work day and night.
They left the house…… they have lived for 20 years
……..he travels a lot, he loves his homeland.
Deal…….with children.
It …….in Australia every year
The minister …..…visit our school tomorrow.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The minister is to visit our school tomorrow.

The verb to be + to + infinitive

Examples: The President is to meet the ambassador tomorrow.
The thick fog is to clear this afternoon.
You can use these structure to talk about future plans or forecasts. You often see it in newspaper.

questionsData.title: The students went out of school…… when the bell rang.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The students went out of school running when the bell rang.

The past continuous tense is used to describe an ongoing action that was happening in the past. In this sentence, it indicates that the students were in the process of running out of school when the bell rang.

questionsData.title: While the Turkish people ……., several earthquakes hit the country.
questionsData.explain_answer: The structure "while + past continuous" is often used in combination with the past simple tense to express two  actions in the past.

questionsData.title: The victims of the earthquake were…
Lina has been …. at MOE since 2004.
questionsData.explain_answer:
Lina has been working at MOE since 2004.

  • "Works" is the simple present tense, which wouldn't be appropriate here because we're talking about an ongoing action that started in the past and continues to the present.
  • "Work" is the base verb form and wouldn't be used in a continuous tense construction.
  • "Working" is the present participle, which is the correct form to use for the present perfect continuous tense ("has been working"). This tense expresses an action that started in the past and continues up to the present.
  • "Worked" is the simple past tense, which would only be appropriate if Lina no longer works at MOE.
